## Airborne Visible/Infrared Imaging Spectrometer-Next Generation (AVIRIS-NG)

The AVIRIS-NG is an imaging spectrometer with a spectral range of 380-2510 nm and sampling resolution of 5nm. The AVIRIS-NG is the replacement to the widely used AVIRIS-Classic. AVIRIS-NG has been used for a variety of remote sensing applications in both marine and terrestial domains since 2012. Visit [here](https://aviris-ng.jpl.nasa.gov/) for more details on the AVIRIS-NG.
